name: DeleteMindmapNode
description:
Delete a mind map node and its child nodes from the board.

Use this tool to delete a specified mind map node and all its child nodes from a Miro board. This is suitable for when you need to clear or restructure parts of a mind map on the board. Requires 'boards:write' permission scope.

parameters.name: board_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which the mind map node will be deleted.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to delete the mind map node.

parameters.name: mindmap_node_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the mind map node to delete, including all child nodes, from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the mind map node that you want to delete.
